name: Shapeshifting
description:
"Ghosts of the past become barbarians...
...Of the future
And I still pity you
Because what you said was true

Mr Bungle - Goodbye Sober Day"


26 frames of portraits animated throught 260 steps of .gif ;

It's my first true experiment of digital painting/drawing technique. I've done it with a second hand and almost broken "bamboo fun" graphic tablet, during a week of 8 hours a day working process, tests and experiments.

This is the first part of an experimental 2 sided work. The second part will be released soon as a collab, the 11/01/2022.
